Seize the Day Action Planner is the best way to plan your day and motivate you to take action!
Organize your day and take action ðŸš€

Seize the Day Action Planner was built for you to easily add your daily action items, save websites that you would like to read later as action items, and keep track of your daily progress by marking off your daily action items.

Use Seize the Day Action Planner for Chrome to:
- Organize your day
- Add websites as action items to visit later
- Easily complete tasks
- View your action progress on the day

Enjoy Seize the Day Action Planner and let's take action!
